newsitem.title: UK: Bankers Trust leads 49 mln stg Varsity Fund bond.
newsitem.headline: Bankers Trust leads 49 mln stg Varsity Fund bond.

text.p: Bankers Trust International said on Friday it was lead manager of a 49 million stg structured 29-year bond launched in the name of Varsity Funding (Holdings) Ltd and guaranteed by Financial Security Assurance.
TYPE STRAIGHT ISS PRICE ** PAY DATE 06.JUN.97
MOODY AAA LISTING LUX PAY FREQ =
NEG PLG YES CRS DEFLT = FORCE MAJ YES
GOV LAW ENGLISH HOME CTRY = TAX PROVS STANDARD
UNDERLYING GOVT BOND 8.00 PERCENT GILT DUE 2021
NOTES **TO BE PRICED LATER. COUPON STEPS UP BY 0.25 POINT
PER ANNUM UNTIL 2007 WHEN FIXED UNTIL MATURITY.
AMORTISES FROM 2007. AVERAGE LIFE IS 22.26 YEARS.
